thread.title: Outstanding! Close to the theaters and restaurants - Review
thread.title_full: Outstanding! Close to the theaters and restaurants - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York - Times Square Central, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Linda K
title: Outstanding! Close to the theaters and restaurants - Review
text: Conveniently located. Lobby & check-in are on the 4th floor. We stayed in a corner room on 33rd floor. All Hilton Garden Inns have showers -no tub. The room could use better black out drapes. A small room but very comfortable. This hotel features the Hilton Garden Inn Sleep System bed. Large bathroom with a floor to ceiling window overlooking The Times square ball. Coffee maker, microwave & fridge. Safe. Plenty of storage and outlets. Breakfast is good.
